greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest number whose unsorted prime signature is the reversed unsorted prime signature of n.
comment: Unsorted prime signature (A124010) is the sequence of exponents in a number's prime factorization.
example: The prime signature of 12345678 = 2*3*3*47*14593 is (1,2,1,1), and the least number with prime signature (1,1,2,1) is 1050 = 2*3*5*5*7, so a(12345678) = 1050.
xref: Numbers whose prime signature is aperiodic are A329139.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Apr 18 2020
